column1: Please do not change the template headings.
First data column must be blank.
If you are uploading new records, leave the "name" (ID) column blank.
If you are uploading new records, "Naming Series" becomes mandatory, if present.
Only mandatory fields are necessary for new records. You can delete non-mandatory columns if you wish.
For updating, you can update only selective columns.
You can only upload upto 5000 records in one go. (may be less in some cases)

column12: Send only if there is any data
column13: Only Send Records Updated in Last X Hours

column6: One of: Daily, Weekdays, Weekly, Monthly
column17: One of: Daily, Weekly, Monthly, Quarterly, Half Yearly, Yearly
column19: One of: Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday, Sunday
